item.title: Isis
item.content: Isis was the sister and wife of Osiris. On his side she ruled over Egypt. When she heard of her husband's murder, she was grief stricken. She tirelessly searched for his body so that he may be properly buried and rest in peace in the Underworld. When she finally found him, she and her sister Nephthys used their magic to revive him just long enough, so that Isis could conceive a child with him. The child was a boy named Horus.
